text.$invariant:
Automating your rolling door makes entering and exiting your home a breeze. However, there’s plenty of benefits beyond convenience. Automating your rolling sheet door on your home carport or shed can also make it safer and more secure.

What sets Automatic Technology rolling door operators apart?

contentData.heading: Help protect your family
contentData.description: Automatic Technology rolling door operators allow you to keep safe when entering and exiting your home late at night or in the middle of a storm.

contentData.heading: In-built smarts
contentData.description: They feature in-built automatic reversing smarts that reverse the door if an obstruction is in the way.

contentData.heading: Prevent unwanted entry
contentData.description: Using the automatic back drive feature which forces the door back down if it senses an intruder is trying to lift the door.

contentData.heading: Easy to install
contentData.description: Easy to install so you can count on the reliability of Automatic Technology operators to lift and lower your garage door, day in and day out, for many years to come.

contentData.heading: Clever safety reminders
contentData.description: Just like your car, your garage door motor is full of moving parts that require periodic servicing to maintain its performance. Automatic Technology operators give you an audio and visual reminder when they’re ready for a service.

contentData.heading: Stress tested for durability
contentData.description: With the soft start and stop technology reducing stress on the operators, allowing the door to open and close both quickly and quietly year after year, not just when it’s installed.
